```css
// Property: hidesBarsOnSwipe
// Description: Set this to true to hide the navigation bar on swipe.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window, Ti.UI.iOS.SplitWindow
'.hides-bars-on-swipe': { hidesBarsOnSwipe: true }
'.hides-bars-on-swipe-false': { hidesBarsOnSwipe: false }
```
